description: Producers include: Bruce Fairbairn, Bob Rock, Jon Bon Jovi, Richie Sambora, Lance Quinn. Part of Universal Music's budget-priced Icon series, this 14-track collection of hits from New Jersey rockers Bon Jovi includes radio standards like "You Give Love a Bad Name," "Wanted Dead or Alive," "Livin' on a Prayer," "Runaway," "Bad Medicine," and "Blaze of Glory." ~ James Christopher Monger
